mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PARTY ( host_no, host_name, party_title, party_contents ) VALUES ( #{host_no:INTEGER}, #{host_name:VARCHAR}, #{party_title:VARCHAR}, #{party_contents:VARCHAR} )
mapper.delete: UPDATE PARTY SET party_del_check = TRUE WHERE party_no = #{party_no:INTEGER} AND party_del_check = FALSE
mapper.update: UPDATE PARTY SET host_no = #{host_no:INTEGER}, host_name = #{host_name:VARCHAR}, party_title = #{party_title:VARCHAR}, party_contents = #{party_contents:VARCHAR}, party_regtime = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), party_num = #{party_num:INTEGER}, party_del_check = #{party_del_check:BOOLEAN} WHERE party_no = #{party_no:INTEGER};
UPDATE PARTY SET party_num = party_num + 1 WHERE party_no = #{party_no:INTEGER} AND party_del_check = FALSE
mapper.select: SELECT p.party_no, p.host_no, p.host_name, p.party_title, p.party_contents, p.party_regtime, p.party_num, c.cmt_no, c.cmt_regtime, c.cmt_content, c.cmt_writer FROM PARTY p LEFT JOIN COMMENT c ON p.party_no = c.party_no WHERE p.party_del_check = FALSE AND c.cmt_del_check = FALSE ORDER BY cmt_no;

SELECT p.party_no, p.host_no, p.host_name, p.party_title, p.party_contents, p.party_regtime, p.party_num, c.cmt_no, c.cmt_regtime, c.cmt_content, c.cmt_writer FROM PARTY p LEFT JOIN COMMENT c ON p.party_no = c.party_no WHERE p.party_del_check = FALSE AND c.cmt_del_check = FALSE AND p.party_no = #{party_no:INTEGER} ORDER BY cmt_no;
